name: Run Ball Chicken Tournament
description:
The Annual Runball Tournament has just begun!

 Do you have what it takes to defeat the national teams and claim the crown?

 To persevere and become the winner of:

 -- RUNBALL CHICKEN TOURNAMENT -- 

Grab your balls with all your might, and knock out opponents in a match to advance to the next bracket! 

-- 

Game made for the Low Effort Game Jam July 2022 

Made by: Mari and Adil
